name: Neon Arcane Hoodie
description: Electric blue hoodie inspired by Jinx's chaotic style.

description: Fingerless gloves with faux metal details. Pure Zaun energy.

name: Jinx Graffiti T-Shirt
description: White tee with spray-paint design. Messy and iconic.

name: Silco's Trench Coat
description: Long, dark, villain-worthy — power coat vibes.

name: Undercity Street Cap
description: Dark grey snapback with Zaun green lining.

name: Piltover Rug
description: Steampunk patterned rug with gold thread lining.

name: Hextech Wall Lamp
description: Wall-mounted lamp with a faint blue glow. Feels magic-infused.

name: Arcane Art Canvas
description: Large canvas art of Jinx and Vi’s final battle moment.

name: Zaun Neon Clock
description: Neon green-lit wall clock with glitchy effects.

name: Caitlyn’s Crystal Vase
description: Elegant and sharp. Subtle Piltover class.

name: Echo Projection Orb
description: Changes colors with sound — vibey and mysterious.

name: Zaun Earbuds
description: Dark green noise-cancelling buds with edgy, gritty finish.

name: Hextech Smartwatch
description: Sleek digital smartwatch with glowing runes around the edge.

name: Piltover Bluetooth Speaker
description: Polished brass finish, high-quality sound. Looks like a relic.

name: Jinx Flash Drive (64GB)
description: Flash drive shaped like Jinx’s rocket — chaotic storage.
